message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its unique features and capabilities, we're confident it will be a valuable asset to you. Considering its worth and potential impact, I'm extending an exclusive offer to purchase the product for $1500000.

I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this price reflects the product's value and potential impact on my business, while also being a fair price for me to pay.
